3.「……そいつは 新しい賢者か？: ... Is that the new wise guy?

4.「う…ううん！| まだ賢者には なっていないの。| でも 今 転職の試験を 終え: Uh... No! I haven't become a sage yet. But I|just finished my exams for my new job.

6.「彼女が 幼なじみの シェリル。| あのドゥラさまと 院長の座を争ったほど| 実: She's my childhood friend. She's so powerful|and wise that she competed with the Dura-|sama for the Director's position.

8.「最近は この研究院にも| 顔を 出さなくなったんだけど| 今日は どうしたのか: I haven't seen you at the institute lately,|but I wonder what happened today.

9.<if_woman>「ああっ！ ごめんね また話が脱線しちゃった！| <pc>ち: <if_woman>Aah! Sorry, I got sidetracked again! I'll|let Teeza know that <pc> passed|the exam, so you can rest assured!<else>Aah! Sorry, I got sidetracked again! I'll|let Teeza know that Mr. <pc>|passed the exam, so you can rest assured!<endif>

10.<if_woman>「ティーザさんの所に行けば| 賢者に 転職できるようにしてく: <if_woman>Go to Mr. Teeza's and he'll help you change|your name to Sage! Congratulations,|<pc>!<else>Go to Mr. Teeza's and he'll help you become|a sage! Congratulations, <pc>!<endif>
